      • getQueryInsertValuesParam

        public static java.lang.String getQueryInsertValuesParam(java.lang.String queryString,
                                                         java.lang.String[] columns)
        Method utility convert a insert query of JOOQ in a insert query for springframework jdbc.
        Parameters:
        queryString - the String of the query JOOQ.
        columns - the Array of String with names of columns.
        Returns:
        the String of the Query SpringFramework JDBC.
